words.def: (of persons or their actions) able or disposed to inflict pain or suffering
the cardinal number that is the sum of five and one
Having two mutations on two genes on the same chromosome of a homologous pair.
ratio of the adjacent side to the hypotenuse of a right-angled triangle
a former French coin of low denomination
a nonmetallic element belonging to the halogens
A working-class punk rock  subgenre of the 1970s, sometimes associated with racism.
the syllable naming the fifth (dominant) note of any musical scale in solmization
North American republic containing 50 states - 48 conterminous states in North America plus Alaska in northwest North America and the Hawaiian Islands in the Pacific Ocean
